section.p: Evaluationof the introduction of a tube into a hollow organ.

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] lengthTube with data type Physical Quantity
Contains the length of the endotracheal tube at the external reference point.

Contains exactly one [1..1] sizeTube with data type Physical Quantity
Contains the size of the endotracheal tube.
